article: an israeli soldier and four members of the israeli-allied south lebanon army -lrb- sla -rrb- were wounded monday in a hezbollah attack on the border zone in south lebanon , which triggered two israeli air raids , security sources said .
abstract: israeli soldier wounded in hezbollah attack in south lebanon
